She thinks she can do everything.她觉得她可以做所有的事情.
Tā juéde tā kěyǐ zuò suǒyǒu de shìqing.

How old are you?
(when asking an elderly person)今年高寿?
Jīnnián gāoshòu?

I went to Vancouver four weeks ago.四个礼拜前,我去了温哥华.
Sìge lǐbài qián, wǒ qùle Wēngēhuá.

I was in Vancouver for two weeks.我在温哥华呆了两个礼拜.
Wǒzài Wēngēhuá dāile liǎng gè lǐbài.

When it rains in Xian, the temperature drops down a lot.西安下雨的时候,温度很低.
xīān xiàyǔ de shíhòu, wēndù hěn dī.

Xian today is only ten degrees Celcius.西安今天只有十摄氏度.
Xi'an jīntiān zhǐyǒu shí(10) shèshì dù.

I'm back!我回来了!
Wǒ huílái le!

I'm not so tired.我不是那么累.
Wǒ bùshì nàme lèi.

Last year yesterday was which date?去年的昨天是几月几号?
Qùnián de zuótiān shì jǐ yuè jǐ hào?
(The reply requires the full year/month/day specification.)

[a saying] (I/we) Hope son becomes dragon, hope daughter becomes phoenix.望子成龙,望女成凤.
Wàng zǐ chéng lóng, wàng nǚ chéng fèng.

In Canada, Vancouver is the third largest city.在加拿大,温哥华是第三大城市.
Zài Jiānádà, Wēngēhuá shì dì sān dà chéngshì.
(note: 加 is jiā, not jiān)

Try and see if it tastes good.尝尝看吧好吃不好吃.
Chángcháng kàn ba hǎochī bù hǎochī.

Let me try it. (Let me check it out.)我试试看.
Wǒ shìshì kàn.

Sometimes, the weather forecast is incorrect.有的时候,天气预报不对.
Yǒude shíhòu, tiānqì yùbào bùduì.

We can speak Chinese together!我门一起说中文!
Wǒmén yīqǐ shuō zhōngwén!

After bike riding, do you plan to make dinner or go out to a restaurant?骑车子以后,你打算做饭还是去饭馆?
Qí chēzi yǐhòu, nǐ dǎsuàn zuòfàn háishè qù fànguǎn?

Let us eat this slice of watermelon together.我门一块儿(一起)吃这块(儿)西瓜.
Wǒmen yíkuàir(yīqǐ) chī zhèikuài(r) xīguā.

Do you want to eat a pear or a kiwi?你吃梨还是猕猴桃？
Nǐ chī lí háishì míhóutáo？

Cats like neither pears nor kiwis.梨或者猕猴桃，猫都不喜欢.
Lí huòzhě míhóutáo, māo dōu bùxǐhuan.

Cold or not, I wouldn't want to go out.冷还是不冷，我都不想出去.
Lěng háishì bù lěng wǒ dōu bùxiǎng chūqù.

Did you go or did he go?你去,还是他去?
Nǐ qù háishì tā qù?

Either he or I can.我或者他，都可以.
Wǒ huòzhě tā ，dōu kěyǐ.

(either) He or I could make dinner.我或者他都可以做饭.
Wǒ huòzhě tā dōu kěyǐ zuòfàn.

Do you have time tomorrow or the day after?你明天有空还是后天有空？
Nǐ míngtiān yǒukòng háishì hòutiān yǒukòng?

I have time either tomorrow or the day after.明天或者后天我都有空.
Míngtiān huòzhě hòutiān wò dōu yǒukòng.

Sunny days and overcast ones are both cold.晴天或者阴天都很冷.
Qíngtiān huòzhě yīntiān dōu hěn lěng.

Should I phone you guys?我打给你们，好吗？
Wǒ dǎ gěi nǐmen, hǎo ma?

We want girls. OR
We want a girl. (i.e. a daughter)我们想要女孩子.  Wǒmen xiǎngyào nǚháizi.
Who has his birthday on Dec 25?谁12月25号过生日？ Shéi 12yuè 25 hào guò shēngrì？
Your wife's birthday is in which month?你的太太的生日是/在几月 ？ Nǐde tàitai de shēngrì shì/zài jǐyuè ?
Thomas took me to (and dropped me off at) the train station.Thomas 送我去火车站. Thomas sòng wǒ qù huǒchē zhàn.
I gave you a present.我送(给）你一个礼物. Wǒ sòng （gěi) nǐ yíge lǐwù.
You don't want to sleep now, do you?现在你不想睡觉吧？Xiànzài nǐ bù xiǎng shuìjiào ba?

Says who?!
I really do want to sleep.谁说的？ 我很想睡觉。Shéi shuōde? Wǒ hěn xiǎng shuìjiào.
He's probably dead tired, isn't he?他大概累死了吧？ Tā dàgài lèi sǐle ba?
They should pay attention to safety; however they didn't.他们应该注意安全，可是他们没有. Tāmen yīnggāi zhùyì ānquán, kěshì tāmen méiyǒu.
Yesterday, I should've phoned you, but I didn't.昨天我应该给你打电话 ，可是我没有. Zuótiān wǒ yīnggāi gěinǐ dǎdiànhuà, kěshì wǒ méiyǒu.
What was Beijing's weather like on 11/16?北京11月16号的天气怎么样？ Běijīng 11 yuè 16 hào de tiānqì zěnmeyàng?
In Beijing the day after tomorrow, is it probably going to rain?后天北京大概会下雨吧？ Hòutiān Beijing dàgài huì xiàyù ba?
I want to wear a sweater on 12/24.我12月24号想穿毛衣. Wǒ shí èr yuè èr shí sì hǎo  xiǎng chuān máoyī.
I need a cup of water.我需要一杯水. Wǒ xūyào yì bēi shuǐ.
What time?什么时候? Shénme shíhou?

I'm not sure. (i.e. I haven't decided yet.)我不确定.
Wǒ bú quèdìng.

I haven't decided on the starting time for the class.我不确定上课时间.
Wǒ bú quèdìng shàngkè shíjiān.

Today's high will be 10 degrees.今天的高温是十度.
Jīntiān de gāowēn shì 10 dù.

Hot weather is very uncomfortable.高温天气很不舒服.
Gāowēn tiānqì hěn bù shūfu.

What's your phone number?你的电话是多少?
Nǐde diànhuà shì duōshao?

How is Sue going to the train station?Sue 怎么去火车站?
Sue zěnme qù huǒchēzhàn?

Mary thinks Sue will go to the supermarket at what time? (implicitly suggesting that Mary is mistaken)Mary 以为 Sue 什么时候去超市?
Mary yǐwéi Sue shénme shíhou qù chāoshì?

So many people! OR Too many people!人太多了!
Rén tàiduō le!

Your cup is bigger than mine.你的杯子比我的(杯子)大.
Nǐde bēizi bǐ wǒde (bēizi) dà.

Your cup is bigger.你的杯子比较大.
Nǐde bēizi bǐjiào dà.

Does a big supermarket have more people or does a small supermarket have more people?大超市的人多还是小超市的人多?
Dà chāoshì de rén duō háishi xiǎo chāoshì de rén duō?

A big supermarket has more people than a small supermarket.
;
A big supermarket has more people.大超市的人比小超市的人多.
Dà chāoshì de rén bǐ xiǎo chāoshì de rén duō.
;
大超市的人比较多.
Dà chāoshì de rén bǐjiào duō.

Last week, you went to Boulder for a meeting.上星期你去博尔特有会议.
shàng xīngqī nǐ qù Bóěrtè yǒu huìyì.

How long is the drive to Boulder?坐车去Boulder需要多长时间？
Zuòchē qù Boulder xūyào duōcháng shíjiān?

Altogether, there were about 20 people at this meeting.一共大约20人参加这个会议.
Yígòng dàyuē 20 rén cānjiā zhège huìyì.

Xian's summer is wet.西安的夏天很湿.
Xi'an de xiàtiān hěn shī.

Compared to other areas, your area is dry.你们的地方比其他的地方干.
Nǐmende dìfang bǐ qítāde dìfang gān.

Xian, compared to Vancouver, is much warmer.西安比温哥华暖和很多.
Xi'an bǐ wēngēhuā nuǎnhuo hěn duō.

Vancouver's weather, compared to Xian's, is much colder.温哥华的天气比西安冷很多.
Wēngēhuá de tiānqì bǐ Xi'an lěng hěnduō.

Westminster in summer only rains a little bit.威斯敏斯特的夏天只下一点雨.
Wēisīmǐnsītè de xiàtiān zhǐ xià yìdiǎn yǔ.

Winter is wet, compared to summer.冬天比夏天湿.
Dōngtiān bǐ xiàtiān shī.

Xian's summers are always wet.西安的夏天总是很湿.
Xi'an de xiàtiān zǒngshì hěn shī.
